WRITING.TEXT:

WRITING.TITLE: 5.5 days in Iceland
WRITING.TEXT: We're flying in on April 26 and out May 1. How brutal will the weather be? And has anyone gone for about 5 days and has a sample itinerary? We are ending with some friends at the Blue Lagoon April 30, otherwise no plans yet. Flying into Reykjavik but down for anything. Any ideas? Thanks in advance! Probably just want to do all the cool scenery and outdoorsy stuff that we can, weather permitting

Awesome, thanks so much, and congrats on whatever you're doing. I feel like honestly, only people who do this stuff know how hard it is. But it beats having a boss :D

Amen! I'm not even against the 18-hour days because I like what I do, but things like the recent USPS hike just crush us...stuff like that makes me want to try something new. Congrats on your success!
Great info, thank you!
There's a lot of great info in this thread, but congrats on your biz! I'd kill to get to 1.8 in sales! Nice work
Good stuff to know, and totally right with the low/no barrier of entry, hence everyone does what we do...we just do it better :) Thanks for the info!
Can you recommend the one you used? And did you end up selling?
Good things to know, I am not sure that there'd be a ton of value then for this business. Thanks!

Thank you! I'm in Utah. The one big plus I see for my biz is it CAN be done by a stay-at-home mom (and it's not MLM!!!) and we have a ton of those around. But of course that's not actually going to add value, just make the sale more attractive (I think). The more I'm reading, I think it might make more sense to keep growing it like I am. I make good money and it's relatively fun, I'm just a bit bored with it really
That's surprisingly inexpensive, and they seem to be quite legit from what I've seen so far. Thanks!
I hear ya. I'm in printed items (clothing, etc) so my guess is the multiple would be quite small, but even the profits x 3 makes sense, so thanks!
I see, that makes sense. Thanks for all your info, it's been super helpful
Thanks, this is extremely helpful. Do businesses like these just sell on classifieds sites? I am curious where I could even list, if I wanted to.
